attributes.action: legislate against the sale of fireworks to non licenced users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of fireworks in residential areas for weeks leading upto Bonfire night and weeks after Bonfire night has reached an intolerable level for others living in the immediate area. It appears to have become an event driven pastime of the younger members of the community that cause mayhem and distress to those of us attempting to relax after a long day at work or those trying to sleep before the night shift commences.
The novelty of Bonfire night is somewhat worn off by the time the celebratory night arrives for most of us.
Injuries due to the inappropriate use or otherwise will be dramatically reduced with the introduction of licencing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
